1.text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

2.text: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;

1.text: And seeing the multitudes, he went up into a mountain: and when he was set, his disciples came unto him:

2.text: And he opened his mouth, and taught them, saying,

3.text: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

4.text: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.

9.text: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

10.text: Thy kingdom come, Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

11.text: Give us this day our daily bread.

19.text: Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost:

20.text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you always, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
